description: Create dedicated schema, template, validator, and instructions for CLAUDE.md frontmatter to prevent validation regressions and wrong schema application (foundation-doc vs CLAUDE.md-specific).

context.problem: CLAUDE.md files are system documentation but don't fit foundation-doc schema pattern, causing CRITICAL validation errors when wrong schema is applied
current_issues: Missing required fields (workorder_id, generated_by, feature_id, doc_type)
Wrong agent attribution (papertrail instead of coderef-docs)
solution_components: claude-md-frontmatter-schema.json - Defines required/optional fields for CLAUDE.md
CLAUDE.md frontmatter template - Standard template for coderef-docs agent
validate_claude_md MCP tool - Papertrail validator for CLAUDE.md files
Updated coderef-docs instructions - When/how to use CLAUDE.md schema
related_workorders: WO-EXPLORER-SIDEBAR-UX-001 (CLAUDE.md regression discovered in Phase 2 validation)
